original_title: 超級無敵追女仔2之狗仔雄心
overview: Frame Magazine's "Doggie Team" captain Sun Lik Beer, members Lam Lum Lum and Hark Jai Ching are assigned to follow the four women musical group Sweeties to expose their untold secrets. The trio boards a cruise to collection information on the group. After coming into contact with them, the three "Doggie Team" members find romantic feelings for the four singers.
title: Love Cruise
